const{id:infoId}=params;const{state}=useContext(Store);const{userInfo}=state;const[{loading,error,loadingUpdate,loadingUpload},dispatch]=useReducer(reducer,{loading:true,error:""});const[title,setTitle]=useState("");const[slug,setSlug]=useState("");const[source,setSource]=useState("");const[image,setImage]=useState("");const[blog,setBlog]=useState("");const[type,setType]=useState("");const[description,setDescription]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{const
